Data.name: BKL Closed Epics w Open items
Data.jql: issueFunction in epicsOf('project = MILES4ALL AND status not in (Inactive, Ready, Closed, Resolved)') AND status in (Closed, Resolved)

Data.name: BKL Epics missing Labels
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND issuetype = Epic AND labels not in (Technical_BE, Technical_NL, NL, BE)

Data.name: BKL Open Epics of Closed Sagas
Data.jql: issueFunction in portfolioChildrenOf('project = MILES4ALL and issuetype = Saga and status in (Closed, Resolved)') AND status not in (Closed, Resolved)

Data.name: BKL Open Epics w.o. Issues
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND issuetype = Epic AND status not in (Closed, Resolved) AND issueFunction not in epicsOf('project = MILES4ALL')

Data.name: BKL Open items in Closed Epics
Data.jql: issueFunction in issuesInEpics('issueFunction in epicsOf("project = MILES4ALL AND issuetype = Test AND status not in (Inactive, Ready)") AND status in (Closed, Resolved)') AND status not in (Inactive, Ready, Closed, Resolved)

Data.name: BKL Open Sagas w ONLY Closed Epics
Data.jql: issueFunction in portfolioParentsOf('project = MILES4ALL and issuetype = Epic and status in (Closed, Resolved)') AND status not in (Closed, Resolved) AND issueFunction not in portfolioParentsOf('project = MILES4ALL and issuetype = Epic and status not in (Closed, Resolved)') AND status not in (Closed, Resolved)

Data.name: BKL Resolved items yesterday openSprints
Data.description: All items of our Sprint moved to Resolved yesterday
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND Sprint in openSprints() AND status = Resolved AND status changed after startOfDay(-1) AND status changed before endOfDay(-1)

Data.name: CtrlMyTestsExecutionsNotClosed
Data.jql: issue in testExecWithTestRunsAssignedToUser() AND status != Closed

Data.name: CtrlSoficoSync
Data.description: Query to feed export lists for prios Sofico from MILES4ALL-Sofico Sync board
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND issuetype not in (Test, Pre-Condition, 'Test Set', 'Test Execution', 'Test Plan') AND status != Closed AND Labels in (Sofico) AND priority in (Critical, High) AND status in (New, Open, 'In Specification', 'In Progress', Pending) ORDER BY priority, Status, Rank ASC

Data.name: CtrlTestAfterFirstDec2022UnreleasedPASSNoEvidence
Data.description: All Tests that were found in Unreleased Executions, PASS, but NO Evidence
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND (issue in testExecutionTests('CtrlTestExecsAfterFirstDec2022Unreleased', PASS, '', 'true', '', '', 'false') OR issue in testExecutionTests('CtrlTestExecsAfterFirstDec2022Unreleased', PASS, '', 'false', '', '', 'false'))

Data.name: CtrlTestExecsAfterFirstDec2022Unreleased
Data.jql: project = MILES4ALL AND issuetype = 'Test Execution' AND createdDate >= '2022/12/01' AND (fixVersion in unreleasedVersions() OR fixVersion is EMPTY) ORDER BY cf[10930] DESC
